txt.en: You have enabled the quest guiding system! This system will mark the general locations of all tracked quest objectives on your map as well as point you to the closest objective via a directional arrow on the radar. When you are within range of the closest objective, the directional arrow will disappear and the area name will become highlighted. Hovering over the map markers, directional arrow, or area name highlight will generate a tooltip telling you what quest it is related to.

You have enabled the quest guiding system!
